item.title: What Haskell Teaches Me About Writing Swift
item.description: Summary I had a chance to present a longer version of my Swift Summit Lightning Talk at AltConf 2015 in San Francisco. Just some personal thoughts on what knowing some Haskell teaches me about writing Swift code. Slides The PDF Slides can be downloaded directly. View the slides on SpeakerDeck Video Available on the Realm Altconf site References Here are the links to the references mentioned in my talk
